description:
The R-3 Powered is the result of the R-3 having the Plus Parts equipped.
The Plus Parts correct the R-3`s weakness of having low armor. It`s capable of flight thanks to the T-Link Flight System. It has several Tesla Drives installed, which allows it to have high mobility, and also allows the SRX to fly once they transform into it.
During the combination into SRX, R-3 Powered becomes the SRX`s legs.
name: R-3 Powered
